metadata.title: CVE-2023-51779 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: bt_sock_recvmsg in net/bluetooth/af_bluetooth.c in the Linux kernel through6.6.8 has a use-after-free because of a bt_sock_ioctl race condition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
